briefTitle: Study of Cabozantinib (XL184) Versus Prednisone in Men With Metastatic Castration-resistant Prostate Cancer Previously Treated With Docetaxel and Abiraterone or MDV3100
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Study of Cabozantinib (XL184) Versus Prednisone in Metastatic Castration-resistant Prostate Cancer Patients Who Have Received Prior Docetaxel and Prior Abiraterone or MDV3100
summary: This study will evaluate the effect of cabozantinib compared to prednisone on overall survival in men with previously treated metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer with bone-dominant disease who have experienced disease progression on docetaxel-containing chemotherapy and abiraterone or MDV3100.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: OS was measured from the time of randomization until 614 events, approximately 24 months after study start
